trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

trait.name: Elemental Resistance
entries: The elemental master is resistant to one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning or thunder.

trait.name: Elemental Strike (1/Turn).
entries: The elemental master can choose to apply one of the following effects to an unarmed attack that hits a creature:
* Flame’s Fury: The target takes an additional 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage.
* Ocean’s Crash: The target takes an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage and must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
* Wind’s Breath: The target takes an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) force damage and must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be pushed 20 feet in a direction of the

* Mountain’s Embrace: The target takes an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage. The elemental master gains resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Flame’s Fury
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) fire damage.

action.name: Elemental Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) elemental damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.
